name: Gaslight
description:
In a town that calls itself Purgatory, one person seeks retribution by aiding others in lighting their own lamps.

In “Gaslight”, you take on the role of Karen, a soul lost in Purgatory. Angry, confused, and narcissistic, you’ve been tasked with saving 6 other lost souls. Using your new-found ability (and wicked stick), you must light the way and guide the souls to their final destination. But beware, there is something that lurks in the dark that seeks to devour their and your soul.

Check out the game at https://marinathan.github.io/gaslightGold/index.html 

Created by Abigail Graham, Alex Sainsbury, Conor Teasdale, Nathan Bantug, Rye Fournier, and Sanad Masannat

Originally for INTD 450: Computers and Games at the University of Alberta
